## Knockoff Statistic $W_j$

After we get the knockoff statistic $W_j$, we can compute data-dependent threshold using following formula:
$$
T=\min \left\{t \in \mathcal{W}: \frac{\#\left(j: W_{j} \leq-t\right\}}{\#\left(j: W_{j} \geq t\right\} \vee 1} \leq q\right\}
$$
Where q is target FDR level. Based on the threshold $T$, features j's with $W_j>T$ will be selected.

There are many ways to evaluate the importance of variable and compute $W_j$, here I just list some kncokoff statistic used in our project and interactive tools.
